mapper.select: select ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover,et.name as teacherName,es1.title as subjectLevelTwo, es2.title as subjectLevelOne from edu_course ec left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left join edu_teacher et on et.id = ec.teacher_id left join edu_subject es1 on es1.id = ec.subject_id left join edu_subject es2 on es2.id = ec.subject_parent_id where ec.id=#{courseId};

select ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover,ec.buy_count as buyCount,ec.view_count as viewCount, ecd.description,et.name as teacherName from edu_course ec left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id where ec.id=#{courseId}
